prompts: Create a dual-type Pokemon that looks like a pair of swords with a mystical aura.
Show me an armored Pokemon with ghostly features and a spectral design.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of ancient warriors with hauntingly beautiful colors.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a ghostly knight, wielding dual blades with elegance.
Make a Pokemon that combines both steel and ghost elements in a unique visual style.
Generate an eerie but majestic Pokemon featuring swords and a spectral appearance.
I want a Pokemon that captures the essence of battle with its sword-like features and ghostly colors.
